name: Balachander Balasubramani
my_business: Etouch Solutions is a leading digital marketing and creative solutions company, committed to helping businesses establish a strong digital presence and grow online. With a passionate team of 60+ professionals and over 1000 satisfied clients across India and globally, we deliver high-quality, results-driven services tailored to meet unique business needs.

ideal_referral: Entrepreneurs, Hospitals, Beauty Parlours, Real Estate Owners, Educational Institutes, Insurance Agents, Personal Branding Professionals
top_problem_solved: Lack of Online Presence, Poor Branding & Visual Identity, Low Social Media Engagement, Ineffective Lead Generation, Outdated or No Website, Low Google Rankings (SEO Issues), Unprofessional Marketing Materials , No Digital Advertising Strategy, Difficulty in Managing Google My Business, Traditional Business Cards with No Smart Features
my_favourite_bni_story: Etouch Solutions made a powerful mark at the BNI Indian National Conference 2023 held in Mahabalipuram, Chennai. Our stall showcased our full range of digital marketing and branding services, gaining national visibility and attracting over 100+ new potential clients from across India. This event was a turning point that expanded our reach and strengthened our position as a leading digital solutions provider in the country.

name: Karuppusamy .S
top_product: From planning to handover, we provide complete supervision and coordination for residential and commercial building projects—including design validation, BOQ preparation, quality checks, labour management, and schedule tracking.
ideal_referral: “I’d love to be introduced to someone who has land and is planning to construct a commercial building, like a textile showroom or a clinic. I can support them from site planning to project execution, acting as their professional partner for quality, cost, and timely delivery.”
top_problem_solved: We helped a busy NRI client execute their G+1 - floor Residential Duplex house in Karur without them being physically present. We managed the entire work—from soil test and approvals to handover—ensuring timely progress, material quality, and budget control. The client received weekly updates with no delays or cost overruns.
my_favourite_bni_story: Through a BNI referral, we connected with a water purifier manufacturer owner who had a vague building plan but no technical direction. We transformed his idea into a feasible project, managed every stage, and delivered a modern, cost-efficient commercial building in record time. He’s now one of our strongest referral sources and has recommended us to 3 more clients.
